error.message: 找不到路徑 '/about' 的控制器或是未實作 IController。
error.detail: System.Web.HttpException (0x80004005): 找不到路徑 '/about' 的控制器或是未實作 IController。 於 System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.GetControllerInstance(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType) 於 System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.CreateController(RequestContext requestContext, String controllerName) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.ProcessRequestInit(HttpContextBase httpContext, IController& controller, IControllerFactory& factory) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContextBase httpContext, AsyncCallback callback, Object state) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext httpContext, AsyncCallback callback, Object state) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext context, AsyncCallback cb, Object extraData) 於 System.Web.HttpApplication.CallHandlerExecutionStep.System.Web.HttpApplication.IExecutionStep.Execute() 於 System.Web.HttpApplication.ExecuteStep(IExecutionStep step, Boolean& completedSynchronously)
